title: Unemployment rate in Scotland 2000 to 2019
summary: Overall Unemployment rate has increased over the Year.
Unemployment rate is roughly constant from 2001 to 2008, gradually increasing from 2008 to 2010, and finally roughly constant from 2010 to 2012.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2008 and 2009.
Maximum Unemployment rate, about 8.2 was reported at Year 2010
Minimum Unemployment rate about 4.7 was reached at Year 2008
min_summary: In general Unemployment rate has rose over the Year.
Unemployment rate is roughly constant from 2001 to 2008, gradually increasing from 2008 to 2010, and finally roughly constant from 2010 to 2012.
